nnsec.cryptosystem
Class Cryptosystem

java.lang.Object
  nnsec.cryptosystem.Cryptosystem

public class Cryptosystem
extends java.lang.Object

Cryptosystem class manages public/private key, encrypt/decrypt data and performs basic homomorphic operations.

Nested Class Summary
static class Cryptosystem.MessageTooBigException
          Exception thrown when trying to encrypt or decrypt a message with a fixed s, and then message or ciphertext exceeds the modulus size.
static class Cryptosystem.PublicKey
          Public key that handles public information and encrypts message.

Method Detail

generateKeys

public void generateKeys(int bits,
                         int certainty)
Method that calculates a new pair of private/public keys.

Parameters:
bits - number of bits of the modulus.
certainty - p, q will be not primes with chance < 2^{-certainty}.

Method that calculates a new pair of private/public keys.

getInstance

public static Cryptosystem getInstance()
Method that returns an instance of Cryptosystem class. Users can be sure that only one Cryptosystem object will be present at a time (thanks to the singleton pattern).

Returns:
unique instance of Cryptosystem class.

combineCiphertexts

public static java.math.BigInteger combineCiphertexts(Cryptosystem.PublicKey puk,
                                                      java.math.BigInteger cip1,
                                                      java.math.BigInteger cip2,
                                                      int s)
Method that combines two ciphertexts such that resulting ciphertext encrypts the sum of the two plaintexts in the two given encryptions.

Parameters:
puk - public key
cip1 - first ciphertext
cip2 - second ciphertext
s - value of s that should be used when handling the ciphertexts
Returns:
combined ciphertext

raiseCiphertext

public static java.math.BigInteger raiseCiphertext(Cryptosystem.PublicKey puk,
                                                   java.math.BigInteger cip,
                                                   java.math.BigInteger msg,
                                                   int s)
Method that raises a ciphertext with a plaintext token such that resulting ciphertext encrypts the multiplication of the two plaintexts.

Parameters:
puk - public key
cip - first ciphertext
msg - plaintext token
s - value of s that should be used when handling the ciphertext
Returns:
raised ciphertext
